name: Jawaker | جواكر
description:
Jawaker hosts Trix, complex, Hand, Koutbo 4, Koutbo 6, Tarneeb,Bent Al-Sbeet, Tonj, Basra, Dama, Jawaker Deal, Syrian 41, Leekha, 400, Jackaroo, Balot, Banakil, and Estimation games.
Invite your friends and play online for free, enjoy our private chatting feature and compete against millions of card games enthusiasts from all around the world!

No need to look for four players, or playing cards. Jawaker offers the ultimate entertaining atmosphere to play fun and challenging games

-Jawaker offers Jackaro (Jakaro), Baloot, Tarnib, Syrian 41, Trix, Complex, Partners, Hand (Rummy),Saudi Hand, Hand Partner, Banakel, 400 - Arba3meyeh, Leekha, Koutbo 4, koutbo 6 and Estimation.


- Jawaker is completely free to play online!

- Play against real people anytime you want.

- In-game chat features for ultimate fun!

- Personalized profile picture from your facebook account.

Already a fan of Jawaker? Follow us on social media for the latest news:


facebook.com/Jawaker
https://www.instagram.com/jawaker/
https://twitter.com/jawaker

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played on Jawaker!
